page.title: 20JACKSDALE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The Primary School at{Jacksdale}is situated on Main Road in the village. It has 220 pupils ranging from 5 years to 11 years of age and 8 teaching staff plus headteacher. The pupils leave Jacksdale at the age of 11 and move on to the{Matthew {Holland Comprehensive School}in {Selston. The staff and pupils of Jacksdale School were collectively responsible for producing this part of the Domesday Project but special contributions were made by the following:{Mr. N. Hutchinson, Mrs. J. {Oates, Mr. B. Orridge, Mr. P. Davis, {Gaynor Skinner, Bobby Adams, Robert {Burton, Paul Gutteridge, Maria Bexon, {Paul Cook, Jason Kitson, Debbie {Kenmuir, Andrew Renshaw, Stuart {Burgin, Mark Langton and Toni Gregory.
